website_summaries.verdict: This nap mat might be simple, but when it comes to support, it's thick foam construction is unrivaled. Ideal for cold, hard floors.
pros: Ultra-thick three-inch foam pad delivers superior comfort and keeps cold from seeping in through floors
Fitted bamboo cover boasts natural antibacterial properties and zips off for cleaning
Blanket-free construction is suitable for younger babies
cons: It's bulky even when folded, making it best suited for home use

But that's not why I'm posting, I'm posting because I found the cutest carry case that fits the toddler size exactly. It's the "Large Folding Fabric Storage Bags for Blanket Comforter Clothes,High Density Material,Dual Zipper Dual Handle,Waterproof and Breathable(Pink,24"x20"x11")". I measured the folded up mat and looked all over Amazon for a case that fit and this one is perfect.
